title: Script font
content:
Can anyone tell me what font this is?  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317211407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10846672_10204270864744128_1080315873_n_5354.jpg)
author: sgibbsmom23

comments.content:
Adios Script, by Sudtipos, with some stylistic alternate glyphs (set 2 for the |T|, swash for the |k|):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/adios-script-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317211407/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/adios-script-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/adios-script-pro/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317211407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Adios_5304.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317211407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Adios2_6719.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317211407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Adios3_6082.png)
